Steps: 1. Open app 2. Tap 'Add Profile' 3. Enter valid data (Name: John Age: 25 Height: 175 Weight: 70) 4. Tap Save
Expected Result: Profile created and appears in list with correct data

Test Case: Create profile with all valid boundary values
Steps: 1. Create profile with Age: 13 Height: 100 Weight: 30 2. Save
Expected Result: Profile saves successfully with minimum values

Test Case: Create profile with maximum boundary values
Steps: 1. Create profile with Age: 100 Height: 250 Weight: 300 2. Save
Expected Result: Profile saves successfully with maximum values
All 5 profiles created and displayed. Counter shows '5 of 5 profiles'

Steps: 1. With 5 profiles existing 2. Attempt to add another
Expected Result: System prevents creation. Shows appropriate message or disables add button

Steps: 1. With multiple profiles created 2. Open home screen
Expected Result: All profiles displayed as cards showing Name Age Height Weight

Steps: 1. With fewer than 5 profiles 2. View home screen
Expected Result: Empty slots visually indicated. Counter shows 'X of 5 profiles'

Steps: 1. Select existing profile 2. Delete profile 3. Confirm deletion
Expected Result: Profile removed from list. Counter updates. Slot becomes available

Steps: 1. Create profile with weight: 80kg 2. View strength standards
Expected Result: Beginner Bench Press = 80 × 0.59 = 47kg (rounded)
Novice Bench Press = 80 × 0.82 = 66kg
Intermediate Bench Press = 80 × 1.06 = 85kg
Advanced Bench Press = 80 × 1.29 = 103kg
Beginner Squat = 80 × 0.76 = 61kg
Novice Squat = 80 × 1.12 = 90kg
Intermediate Squat = 80 × 1.47 = 118kg
Advanced Squat = 80 × 1.88 = 150kg
Beginner Deadlift = 80 × 0.94 = 75kg
Novice Deadlift = 80 × 1.29 = 103kg
Intermediate Deadlift = 80 × 1.71 = 137kg
Advanced Deadlift = 80 × 2.18 = 174kg
Beginner Shoulder Press = 80 × 0.41 = 33kg
Novice Shoulder Press = 80 × 0.59 = 47kg
Intermediate Shoulder Press = 80 × 0.76 = 61kg
Advanced Shoulder Press = 80 × 1.00 = 80kg
All 4 exercises shown: Bench Press Squat Deadlift Shoulder Press
Each exercise shows 4 levels: Beginner Novice Intermediate Advanced

Test Case: Select Beginner level for Bench Press
Steps: 1. View profile 2. Tap Beginner box for Bench Press
Expected Result: Beginner highlighted with checkmark. Selection saved

Test Case: Select different levels for different exercises
Steps: 1. Select Beginner for Bench 2. Select Novice for Squat 3. Select Intermediate for Deadlift
Expected Result: Each exercise can have independent level selection

Steps: 1. Select Beginner for Bench 2. Change to Novice
Expected Result: Previous selection removed. New selection highlighted with checkmark
Selected level has highlighted border and checkmark

Steps: 1. Create profile 2. Close app completely 3. Reopen app
Expected Result: Profile data intact with all information

Test Case: Level selections persist after app restart
Steps: 1. Select levels for exercises 2. Close app 3. Reopen app
Expected Result: All level selections preserved

Steps: 1. Create 3 profiles with different data 2. Close app 3. Reopen
Expected Result: All 3 profiles present with correct data
